mapper.sql: id, creator, creator_id, created_time, last_operator, last_operator_id, update_time, product_name, user_id, shop_id, shop_name, title, price, product_type, location, length_play, is_time_limit, start_time, end_time, number_is_limit, number_limit, product_description, image, related_product, status, approval_status, sales, sort, certificate_id, address_id, stock, total_price, equipment_price, is_group
mapper.select: select uc.id coachId, uc.icon coachIcon, uc.coach_name coachName, uc.coach_grade, psp.id, psp.product_name, psp.title, psp.image, psp.price, psp.location, psp.start_time, psp.end_time from pms_course_product psp, ums_coach uc where uc.id = psp.user_id and uc.status = 2 and (psp.product_type = 2 or psp.product_type = 3) and psp.approval_status = 2 and psp.status not in (2,3) order by sort,psp.update_time desc

SELECT DISTINCT pc.user_id, pc.title, pc.start_time, pc.image, pc.location, pc.id FROM oms_order om LEFT JOIN oms_order_item oi ON om.id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN pms_course_product pc ON pc.user_id = om.shop_id

SELECT count(1) FROM pms_course_product pc LEFT JOIN oms_order oo on oo.shop_id = pc.user_id LEFT JOIN oms_order_item oi on oi.order_id = oo.id WHERE pc.user_id = #{userId} AND oi.product_id = #{id} AND oi.product_type = #{productType} AND pc.product_type = #{productType} AND pc.id = #{id} AND pc.approval_status = 2 AND oo.status not in (0,6)

select uc.id coachId, uc.icon coachIcon, uc.coach_name coachName, uc.coach_grade, psp.id, psp.product_name, psp.title, psp.image, psp.price, psp.location, psp.start_time, psp.end_time, psp.status from pms_course_product psp, ums_coach uc where uc.id = psp.user_id and uc.status = 2 and psp.id = #{productId} and psp.status not in (2,3) and psp.approval_status = 2 order by sort desc

SELECT pc.id, pc.user_id, pc.location, pc.title, pc.image, pc.price, uc.icon AS coachIcon, uc.coach_name AS coachName, uc.coach_grade AS coachGrade, pc.product_type FROM pms_course_product pc LEFT JOIN ums_coach uc ON pc.user_id = uc.id
AND pc.title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{content}),'%')
AND pc.approval_status = 2 AND pc.status = 1 AND pc.product_type = 2
ORDER BY pc.sales DESC

SELECT pc.id, pc.user_id, pc.location, pc.title, pc.image, pc.price, uc.icon AS coachIcon, uc.coach_name AS coachName, uc.coach_grade AS coachGrade, pc.product_type FROM pms_course_product pc LEFT JOIN ums_coach uc ON pc.user_id = uc.id
AND pc.title LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{content}),'%')
AND pc.approval_status = 2 AND pc.status = 1 AND pc.product_type = 1
ORDER BY pc.sales DESC
select from pms_course_product where status = #{status} and approval_status = 2

select uc.id coachId, uc.icon coachIcon, uc.coach_name coachName, uc.coach_grade, psp.id, psp.product_name, psp.title, psp.image, psp.price, psp.location, psp.start_time, psp.end_time from pms_course_product psp, ums_coach uc where uc.id = psp.user_id and uc.status = 2 and (psp.product_type = 2 or psp.product_type = 3) and psp.user_id = #{userId} and psp.approval_status = 2 order by sort,psp.update_time desc
select from pms_course_product where status = 1 and approval_status = 2 and user_id = #{userId} and product_type = #{productType} order by update_time desc

SELECT pc.id, pc.image, pc.product_name, pc.title, pc.start_time, pc.end_time, pc.user_id, pc.product_type, pc.location FROM pms_course_product pc WHERE approval_status = 2 AND pc.user_id = #{userId}
and date_format( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = #{searchStartTime}

SELECT pc.id, pc.image, pc.product_name, pc.title, pc.start_time, pc.end_time, pc.user_id, pc.product_type, pc.location, pc.product_id FROM pms_power_notes pc WHERE /*approval_status = 2*/ pc.user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE() , '%Y%m' )
select count(1) from pms_course_product where user_id = #{coachId} and status !=3 and approval_status != 1 and approval_status != 3
select count(1) FROM pms_power_notes where user_id = #{userId} AND product_id = #{id}
